text:
Seeking object oriented software developer to build next generation API for a leading cloud communications service provider in Newark, NJ.

We look for: 1) A passion for programming. You probably have side projects you do for fun just to build your skills. 2 ) Ability to learn quickly. You have experience being thrown into a project and running with it. 3) An exceptional coder who finds it fun to build new things 4) Ability to work collaboratively on a team of like-minded people.

www.phone.com/careers
